as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

:collapse.description: If panel is `collapsible`, collapse it fully.
:collapse.description_zh: 如果面板是可折叠的,则完全折叠它.

:expand.description: If panel is currently collapsed, expand it to its most recent size.
:expand.description_zh: 如果面板当前已折叠,请将其展开到最近的大小.

:getSize.description: Gets the current size of the panel as a percentage (1 - 100).
:getSize.description_zh: 获取面板的当前大小,百分比()1 - 100).

:resize.description: Resize panel to the specified percentage (1 - 100).
:resize.description_zh: 将面板调整为指定的百分比()1 - 100）。

:isCollapsed.description: Returns `true` if the panel is currently collapsed.
:isCollapsed.description_zh: 如果面板当前已折叠,则返回 `true`.

:isExpanded.description: Returns `true` if the panel is currently not collapsed.
:isExpanded.description_zh: 如果面板当前未折叠,则返回 `true`.

:collapsedSize.description: The size of panel when it is collapsed.

:collapsible.description: Should panel collapse when resized beyond its `minSize`. When `true`, it will be collapsed to `collapsedSize`.
:collapsible.description_zh: 当面板调整大小超过其 `minSize` 时是否应折叠.当 `true` 时,它将折叠到 `collapsedSize`.

:defaultSize.description: Initial size of panel (numeric value between 1-100).
:defaultSize.description_zh: 面板的初始大小()1-100 之间的数值).

:maxSize.description: The maximum allowable size of panel (numeric value between 1-100); defaults to `100`.
:maxSize.description_zh: 面板的最大允许大小（1-100 之间的数值);默认为 `100`.

:minSize.description: The minimum allowable size of panel (numeric value between 1-100); defaults to `10`.
:minSize.description_zh: 面板的最小允许大小（1-100 之间的数值);默认为 `10`.

:order.description: The order of panel within group; required for groups with conditionally rendered panels.
:order.description_zh: 组内面板的顺序；对于有条件渲染面板的组是必需的.
